subject: Re: [junit] How to test multi-threaded classes?
msgSnippet: ... JUnitPerf has some support for this, I believe. A question: what test have you tried to write that you have not been able to write with JUnit? J. B.
messageBody:
>So said Jerry Louis on 2003-05-13 --------------------
>Hi,
>
>I am trying to write unit tests for a class with multi-threading.
>Is there a separate framework available for this?

JUnitPerf has some support for this, I believe.

A question: what test have you tried to write that you have not been able to write with JUnit?


J. B. Rainsberger,
President, Diaspar Software Services
Let's write software that people understand.
http://www.diasparsoftware.com/
